definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: The theory of graph investigates the combination of number and graphs as well various applications.
sentences.chinese: 圖論則是着重於數形結合的描述及各種實際應用。

sentences.english: The max-cut problem is a standard NP-hard problem in graph graphic theory.
sentences.chinese: 最大割問題是圖論中的一個典型的NP困難問題。

sentences.english: Graph theory and matroid theory have witnessed an unprecedented growth in the twentieth century.
sentences.chinese: 圖論和擬陣理論在二十世紀經歷了空前的發展。

sentences.english: Bipartite graph is a special model in the Graph Theory.
sentences.chinese: 偶圖是圖論中的一種特殊模型。

sentences.english: Triangulardebt problems are studied upon the views of graphic theory and networking.
sentences.chinese: 本文用圖論和網絡的理論和方法研究三角債問題。

sentences.english: However there still exist lots of problems in the basic graph theory.
sentences.chinese: 然而在基礎圖論中仍然存在許多難題有待解決。

sentences.english: This paper has introduced how to use the graph theory method to calculate the sectorial coordinate of the variable cross-section box girder.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了用圖論法計算變截面箱梁斷面的扇性座標。

sentences.english: The minimal vertex- covering problem of graph is a NP-complete problem of graph theory.
sentences.chinese: 圖的最小頂點覆蓋問題是圖論中的一個NP完全問題。

sentences.english: The study of directed graphs(or digraphs , as we shall usually abbreviate them) arises out of the question, 'what happens if all of the roads are one-way streets?
sentences.chinese: 圖論中還將大量研究一些包含具有特徵的路的圖。

sentences.english: In this paper an algorithm based on graph theory is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於圖論的跳步排樣優化算法。

sentences.english: A description was carried out on the complicated epicyclic gear train by adopting the functional schematic diagram and the knowledge of graph theory.
sentences.chinese: 採用功能示意圖和圖論知識對複雜週轉輪系進行描述。

sentences.english: For example, interesting work has been done in numerics and for graphs.
sentences.chinese: 比如在數值運算和圖論方面都有了許多有趣的工作。

sentences.english: Explain the basic properties of randomized algorithms and methods for analyzing them.
sentences.chinese: 解釋主要圖論演算法及對它們的分析。

sentences.english: At last, the graph-theoretical characteristic of positive transitive fuzzy matrixes is revealed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，進一步揭示了正傳遞模糊矩陣的圖論特徵。

sentences.english: The theory that the article uses graph talking and network and problem of debt of methodological research triangle.
sentences.chinese: 本文用圖論和網絡的理論和方法研究三角債問題。

sentences.english: Moreover, the graph theory method can be used to calculate other parameters.
sentences.chinese: 而且，用圖論法還可以計算其他扇性特徵參數。
